DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability AZD1656 multiple repeat oral dos patient type 2 diabetes top insulin .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety Tolerability After Multiple Oral Doses AZD1656 Type 2 Diabetes Patients Top Insulin
DOC.criteria: Female non childbearing potential Diagnosed Diabetes Mellitus patient treat insulin alone insulin combination antidiabetic drug . Stable blood sugar control indicate change treatment within 3 month prior study start . HbA1c equal 11 % screening ( HbA1c value accord international DCCT standard ) Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge investigator , within two week first administration IP History ischemic heart disease , stroke , transitorisk ischemic attack symptomatic peripheral vascular disease Clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , hematology , urinalysis result .
